data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Vestfold, Norway.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vestfold, Norway
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 19,991 believers in Vestfold that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Vestfold, Norway.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Vestfold.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Vestfold, Norway who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Thai people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Vestfold to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 19,991 believers in Vestfold to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 231,110 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vestfold, Norway has a population of 251,100.

We estimate Vestfold has 19,991 people who might know Jesus, 199,365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 31,745 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 19,991 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
